Workflow.Name: Admin | Sync Template v4 (Driver)
Workflow.Description: This flow retrieves the environments in your tenant by using List Environments as Admin, and creates or updates a record for each environment in the Dataverse Environment table. Running this flow will also trigger the rest of the sync flows indirectly by updating the environment records in the Dataverse instance.

Description.description: This flow retrieves the environments in your tenant by using List Environments as Admin, and creates or updates a record for each environment in the Dataverse Environment table. Running this flow will also trigger the rest of the sync flows indirectly by updating the environment records in the Dataverse instance.
